::SnowCat:;

She looked at the chambers, "Which one may  I use?" seh turned and 
smiled at Ramulus.  "I have been in the snow mountains for years.  
Ever since I arrived here.  That was so long ago.  I thought I was 
the only one like me here on the planet." She walked to one chamber 
that appeared to be functioning and looked back at him again.  "Thank 
you."  She turned and stepped into the chamber.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus smiles at SnowCat, turning his head to look at her. "You're 
welcome 
> again. I know how you feel. I wandered this planet for years before 
I found 
> the Maximals."
> 
> He stops at the CR chambers, motioning to them. "Here we are, the 
CR 
> chambers."
